ruleset.name: newrules
ruleset.description: These are new rules for the next release

rule.name: OnlyOneReturn
rule.message: A method should have only one exit point, and that should be the last statement in the method
rule.description: A method should have only one exit point, and that should be the last statement in the method.

rule.name: JumbledIncrementer
rule.message: Avoid using an outer loop incrementer in an inner loop for update expression
rule.description: Avoid jumbled loop incrementers - it's usually a mistake, and it's confusing even if it's what's intended.
